name: playwright-js-bdd-accelerator
description: This package helps to create a basic folder structure for Playwright JS with BDD

scripts.advancesearch: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --workers=1 --headed --project=chromium features/regressionPack/advanceSearch/
scripts.applyfromOldpass: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --workers=1 --headed --project=chromium features/regressionPack/applyfromoldpass/
scripts.createuser: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --workers=1 --headed --project=chromium features/regressionPack/createUser/
scripts.lostpass: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --workers=1 --headed --project=chromium features/regressionPack/lostPass/
scripts.profileupdate: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --workers=1 --headed --project=chromium features/regressionPack/profileUpdate/
scripts.rejectpass: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --workers=1 --headed --project=chromium features/regressionPack/rejectpass/
scripts.renewpass: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --workers=1 --headed --project=chromium features/regressionPack/renewPass/
scripts.resetpassword: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --workers=1 --headed --project=chromium features/regressionPack/resetpassword/
scripts.returnpass: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --workers=1 --headed --project=chromium features/regressionPack/returnPass/
scripts.uivalidation: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --workers=1 --headed --project=chromium features/regressionPack/uiValidation/
scripts.sanityPack: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --workers=1 --headed --project=chromium features/sanity/
scripts.loginPack: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --workers=1 --headed --project=chromium features/login-management/
scripts.passPack: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --workers=1 --headed --project=chromium features/pass-management/
scripts.registrationPack: npx bddgen && npx playwright test --workers=1 --headed --project=chromium features/registration-management/
